entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Northgard
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫149,99 [‚Ç∫149,99 ~ ‚Ç∫399,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

In-App Purchases

  • Clan of the LynxÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Scale BundleÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • Clan of the DragonÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Clan of the snakeÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Fur BundleÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • Clan of the HorseÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Clan of the OxÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Winter BundleÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • Clan of the KrakenÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • Clan of the EagleÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Northgard is a strategy game based on Norse mythology in which you control a Clan of Vikings fighting for the control of a mysterious newfound continent. After years of tireless explorations, brave Vikings have discovered a new land filled with mystery, danger and riches: NORTHGARD. The boldest Northmen have set sail to explore and conquer these new shores, bring fame to their Clan and write history through conquest, trading, or devotion to the Gods. That is, if they can survive the dire Wolves and Undead Warriors roaming the land, befriend or defeat the giants, and survive the harshest winters ever witnessed in the North. FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Build your settlement on the newly discovered continent of Northgard ‚Ä¢ Assign your vikings to various jobs (Farmer, Warrior, Sailor, Loremaster...) ‚Ä¢ Manage your resources carefully and survive harsh winters and vicious foes ‚Ä¢ Expand and discover new territory with unique strategic opportunities ‚Ä¢ Achieve different victory conditions (Conquest, Fame, Lore, Trading...) STORY MODE: RIG‚ÄôS SAGA The Viking High King is murdered and his Regal Horn is stolen by a man named Hagen. This event kickstarts a saga that will take Rig, his son and heir accompanied by his right-hand man Brand through the new continent of Northgard. The continent where he will make new friends and foes and discover a much greater threat than Hagen, and the reasons behind his father‚Äôs assassination. MULTIPLAYER ‚Ä¢ Play with or against other Mobile players with up to 6 players ‚Ä¢ Includes Duel, Free for All and Teamplay modes CHOOSE YOUR CLAN In order to complete the 11 campaign chapters, the player will have to master the specificities of the 6 first clans and tame the unforgiving wilderness of Northgard. More clans are joining the fight for Northgard! ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Snake: Act from the shadows and take the lead with cunning guerilla tactics ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Dragon: Embrace the old ways and please the gods with sacrifices ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Kraken: Harness the bounty of the sea and unleash its brutal might You can unlock the clans of the Snake, Dragon and Kraken separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Scale Bundle. ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Horse: Devote yourself to the art of blacksmithing and craft powerful Relics ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Ox: Equip ancestral equipment and prove the might of your forefathers ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Lynx: Adopt Nature‚Äôs way and lure mythical preys into ambushes You can unlock the Clans of the Horse, Ox and Lynx separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Fur Bundle. ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Squirrel: Gather ingredients to prepare special recipes and survive the harsh winters ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Rat: Embrace the way of the Shamans and work for the clan ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Eagle: Occupy a large territory, venture outside and gather resources Unlock the clans of the Squirrel, Rat and Eagle separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Winter Bundle. Carefully redesigned for mobile ‚Ä¢ Revamped interface ‚Ä¢ Game Center achievements ‚Ä¢ iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices If you experience any issue with Northgard, please contact our customer support at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Demumu: Are You Dead?
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫49,99 ~ ‚Ç∫399,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

A lightweight safety tool crafted for solo dwellers, establishing invisible safety protection through check-in monitoring and emergency contact mechanisms to make solitary life more reassuring ¬∑ Automatic Notification for Unchecked-In Days ¬∑ Set up one emergency contact (family member or friend) in advance. If you haven‚Äôt checked in via the app for consecutive days, the system will automatically send an email to them the next day to promptly convey safety anomalies and gain critical intervention time for potential risks ¬∑ Effortless Setup & Use ¬∑ No registration or login required. Simply enter the contact‚Äôs name and email to complete setup on first use. Tap to check in daily, with the background automatically monitoring your status without disturbing daily routines to ensure easy and convenient operation ¬∑ Strict Privacy Protection ¬∑ Uses encryption technology to safeguard emergency contact information and check-in records. Refuses to collect irrelevant permissions like location, eliminating privacy leakage risks and ensuring personal information security for trustworthy safety guardianship ¬∑ For All Solo Dwellers ¬∑ Whether you‚Äôre a solo office worker, a student living away from home, or anyone choosing a solitary lifestyle, Demumu serves as your safety companion: daily check-ins signal safety, while abnormal situations trigger early notifications to give those who care about you peace of mind and add a layer of protection for yourself Alone but not lonely, safety by your side. Protect every solitary moment with simple solutions and build a solid safety line for solo living User Agreement: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/UserAgreement.html Privacy Policy: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/PrivacyPolicy.html Official Email: Demumuofficial@nexun.vip Demumu Team

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Infinity Tank Battle
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫499,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫499,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • 500 TicketsÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • 200 TicketsÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • 50 TicketsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Golden PassÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day. Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle". Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements. Core Game Rule: - Defence your base - Destroy all enemy tanks Key Features: - Different type of enemy - Different type of Map style - Special items - Auto Helper tank - Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫49,99 [‚Ç∫29,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

Inspect papers, prevent smuggling‚Äîkeep the border safe or profit from corruption. Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game. Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants. Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy. Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets. Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country. NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer. Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience. Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully. Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband. Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty. Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband. Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security? Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Inkblade Idlers: Wuxia RPG
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫199,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫49,99 [‚Ç∫49,99 ~ ‚Ç∫199,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

In-App Purchases

  • 1000 Redemption TicketsÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • 80 Redemption TicketsÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

Welcome to "Inkblade Idlers", where the serene beauty of ink-wash painting meets the thrilling world of wuxia martial arts in an idle RPG adventure. Effortless Progression, Deep Strategy Your heroes train and battle automatically, earning silver and experience even when you are offline. Return to spend resources on powerful skills, legendary weapons, and rare manuals to push your team further. Conquer Mighty Bosses, Collect Secret Manuals Face towering martial arts masters in epic showdowns. Each victory unlocks ancient secret manuals that teach your heroes unique and devastating abilities to customize your combat style. Manage Your Martial World Upgrade your shop to increase income, expand your backpack to hold more treasures, and strategically equip your team. Every decision strengthens your path to becoming the ultimate martial arts legend. Key Features: - Breathtaking ink-wash art inspired by traditional Chinese painting - True idle gameplay with progress happening 24/7 - Collect and customize hundreds of weapons, armor, and martial arts manuals - Strategic management of shops, resources, and inventory - Challenging boss fights against powerful martial arts masters Download Inkblade Idlers now and begin your tranquil yet powerful journey to martial arts supremacy. No grinding required.

entry.title: SmallFish Chess for Stockfish
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store. SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking. SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised. Features --------- - Blunder checking - Multiple line analysis - Graphical evaluation of your game - Game previews - Dark mode support - Endgame tablebase - Opening books Why not just download and try it yourself?

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö‚Ç∫499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫49,99 ~ ‚Ç∫499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Today‚Äôs Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization ‚Ä¢ Unlimited notes storage ‚Ä¢ Multiple note colors ‚Ä¢ Pinned & private notes ‚Ä¢ Custom font styles & font sizes ‚Ä¢ Sort notes by name or date ‚Ä¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time ‚Ä¢ Easy note sharing ‚Ä¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security ‚Ä¢ App lock with multiple passcode options ‚Ä¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync ‚Ä¢ iCloud sync for notes ‚Ä¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications ‚Ä¢ Widget for today‚Äôs notes ‚Ä¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager ‚Ä¢ Create and manage PDF files ‚Ä¢ Edit existing PDFs ‚Ä¢ Export notes as PDF ‚Ä¢ Share PDFs easily ‚Ä¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs ‚Ä¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. We‚Äôre committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

Application Screenshot

iPad
